entry.content:
Over the Winter a lot has changed both in my homelab and in the world. I'll try and get some pictures of my lab up before too long. Might make it more interesting. 

I didn't do a lot of tinkering with my lab as I've been busy with family, but I've got a lot of plans with containers and services to start running. I've also gotten a Content Management System (CMS) for creating my website and uploading it easier. The only thing I really need is time so I can get things put together. I suppose that's the key hang up that everyone runs in to.

More to come.
